## âœ… Checklist

### Content Quality
- [ ] Information is accurate and verified
- [ ] Sources are properly cited (APA/IEEE format)
- [ ] Relevance to HyperCode is explained
- [ ] Key insights are highlighted (3-5 bullets)
- [ ] No TODOs or placeholders

### Formatting
- [ ] YAML frontmatter is complete (if research entry)
- [ ] Markdown is properly formatted
- [ ] Headings follow hierarchy (H1 â†’ H2 â†’ H3)
- [ ] Code blocks have language identifiers
- [ ] Lists are properly formatted

### Citations
- [ ] All sources cited in text
- [ ] URLs included with access dates
- [ ] Added to `references/citations.bib`
- [ ] Added to `references/links.md`

### Links
- [ ] All URLs tested and working
- [ ] Internal links are correct
- [ ] Related topics are cross-linked

### Accessibility
- [ ] Clear, descriptive headings
- [ ] Short paragraphs (3-5 sentences)
- [ ] Visual hierarchy (headings, lists, emphasis)
- [ ] Images have alt text (if applicable)
- [ ] Neurodivergent-friendly writing (clear, concise)

### Files
- [ ] New files in correct directory
- [ ] Index files updated (if new category)
- [ ] Roadmap updated (if milestone reached)
